Post.title: githubActions NPM
Post._content:
### 

 utils  Vite  umd  npm, npmPackage  githubActions ,

### 

1.  github  npm  npm  AccessToken,github [secrets](https://docs.github.com/zh/actions/security-guides/using-secrets-in-github-actions),
2.  Action 

### 

```yml
name: Publish Package to npmjs

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      # Setup .npmrc file to publish to npm
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: "16.x"
          registry-url: "https://registry.npmjs.org"
      - run: npm install
      - run: npm run build
      - run: npm publish
        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}
```

 npm  npm
Post.raw:
---
title:  githubActions NPM
tags: github
excerpt:  githubActions NPM
categories: github
---

### 

 utils  Vite  umd  npm, npmPackage  githubActions ,

### 

1.  github  npm  npm  AccessToken,github [secrets](https://docs.github.com/zh/actions/security-guides/using-secrets-in-github-actions),
2.  Action 

### 

```yml
name: Publish Package to npmjs

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      # Setup .npmrc file to publish to npm
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: "16.x"
          registry-url: "https://registry.npmjs.org"
      - run: npm install
      - run: npm run build
      - run: npm publish
        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}
```

 npm  npm
